law.catch_line: Presumption of abandonment of intangible personal property not otherwise covered.
law.text: Except as otherwise provided in KRS 393.010, all intangible property, not otherwise covered by this chapter, including any income or increment thereon and deducting any lawful charges, that is held or owing in this state by any person and has remained unclaimed by the owner for more than three (3) years after it became payable or distributable is presumed abandoned.
law.history: Amended 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 95, sec. 12, effective June 24, 2003. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 267, effective June 16, 1966. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 144, sec. 2. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 142, sec. 8. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1610.
